page.title: 13Leisure in Sheering.
page.content: The main places for leisure and entertainment are the{Church}and {Village Hall. The Youth Club for 11 - 18 year olds meets in the Village Hall but teenagers also come from Lower Sheering and Sawbridgeworth.Most of the other activities are for adults but include Happy Circle(over 60's),keep-fit,yoga and the Cricket Club,The Football Club has about 30 members.Their ground is behind the"Queen's Head",but unorganised games take place on the large recreation ground where there is a cricket pitch and play equipment(slide,swings and roundabout)This is a popular place for walking the dog and bike-riding. For some activities people go to Harlow;especially popular are the Sports Centre and the Town Park.
